document_data.name: Hornbill Ivory
document_data.mainbody: '''Hornbill ivory''' was not really [[ivory]], it was material from the beak of the hornbill bird.{{Cite dragon/72/Gems Galore|21}}
document_data.Description: The hornbill bird in the realms was a large bird with gray plumage and a heavy beak. The sturdy beak could be carved like ivory, and was used to make personal items like combs or beads. It was also used as an inlay in stone or wooden furniture. A typical price was 7 [[silver]] pieces per pound (0.45kg).
document_data.Powers: Hornbill ivory could be used as a material component for spells as well as magical items and tokens that pertained to flight.
